content:
The Egg format supports, among other things:

Vertices

Triangles and larger polygons

Joints (aka Bones)

Vertex weights

Texture pathnames (textures are not stored)

Bone-based animation keyframes

Morph targets (aka Blend targets)

Morph animation keyframes

Many control flags

Notably, these things are not represented:

Light sources

Shaders

The paths (e.g. for textures) can be either relative (as seen from the Egg file) or absolute (full path). See filename-syntax for more info about Panda's Filename Syntax. In most cases the relative path makes more sense.

Animations
